caption: The video starts with a group of researchers in a laboratory. A man and a woman seem to be having a heated argument over something. After a long debate, they still don't come to a unanimous conclusion. During the night, a group of local alien natives attacks the laboratory, reducing some of its facilities to ashes. The next day, in the partially intact laboratory, the disputes become even more intense. Some decide to lie down in hibernation pods, seeking peace, while others work on a high-tech spaceship, intending to use technological means to wage armed conflict against the aliens.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Does it looks like real story? Or it looks like a science fiction movie?)
